channel.title: Need help with making tabs add items and not teleport me
channel.description: i having problem coding my server i wanna make it where you have to have money in you inventory to "buy" item that are in the pk tabs

item.title: Need help with making tabs add items and not teleport me
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:3, topic:443684”]case id: if (c.inWild()) return; } else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, amount) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995, amount); c.getItems().addItem(itemid, amount); } else { c.sendMessage("You need more cash to buy this item!"); } break;[/quote]
@tag If you understand this use his instead of mine :3

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with making tabs add items and not teleport me
